import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Sidebar from './Sidebar'; import MarketTrendsTable from './MarketTrendsTable'; import DepositFAQ from './DepositFAQ'; import MainDepositSection from './MainDepositSection'; import './DepositPage.css'; const DepositPage = () => { const [selectedToken, setSelectedToken] = useState(''); const [selectedNetwork, setSelectedNetwork] = useState(''); const popularTokens = ['USDT', 'BTC', 'ETH', 'TRX', 'SOL', 'BNB']; return (
